statements: DELETE FROM citizenship_approvals_and_denials WHERE denial_reason LIKE '%incomplete%' AND approval_status = 'denied';
DELETE FROM citizenship_approvals_and_denials WHERE citizen_id = 100 AND approval_status = 'denied';
DELETE FROM citizenship_approvals_and_denials WHERE approval_date < '2022-01-01' AND denial_reason LIKE '%missing documents%';
DELETE FROM citizenship_denials WHERE citizen_name = 'Alice Smith';
DELETE FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE approval_id = 1001 AND approval_status = 'APPROVED';
DELETE FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE id = 101 AND approval_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM citizenship_denials WHERE denial_date = '2022-02-20' AND id IN (SELECT id FROM citizenship_history WHERE event_type = 'revocation');
